attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe bringing back national service would help in putting a stop to teenage anti social behaviour, tenage pregnancy and general unruliness amongst teenagers. It would mean at the age of 16, all people unless they were going on to do higher education, would have to take part in a 2 years of national service. Whether it be as part of the armed forces or work within their local community.
It would also give our youngsters a sense of pride and help teach them respect.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
